Graphical User Interfaces¶

Main Frame¶

class pywfom.viewing.Main(system)¶

tkinter.Frame to monitor camera frames, Arduino status, and set file directory

Parameters

system (pywfom.System) -- System interface to be monitored/set

(A) Selected Camera Frame
Camera Status

  • tkinter.Label

  • Shows the selected camera's:

    • name

    • device

    • height

    • width

    • binning

    • framerate

Edit

  • tkinter.Button

  • Opens CameraConfig

Remove

  • tkinter.Button

  • Deletes selected pywfom.imaging.Camera from pywfom.System

(B) Camera Thumbnails
Thumbnails

  • Selectable images of each pywfom.imaging.Camera in pywfom.System

Add Camera

  • tkinter.Button

  • Adds a pywfom.imaging.Camera to pywfom.System

(C) Arduino and Run Status
Select Port

  • tkinter.ttk.Spinbox

  • Calls pywfom.control.list_ports()

  • Sets pywfom.control.Arduino.port

Configure

  • tkinter.Button

  • Opens ArduinoConfig

Arduino Status

  • tkinter.Label

  • Displays pywfom.control.Arduino.ERROR

Current Directory

  • tkinter.Label

  • Sets pywfom.System.directory

Browse

  • tkinter.Button

  • Opens Dialog which sets pywfom.System.directory

(D) Control Buttons
Configure

(tkinter.Button)

Run Viewer¶

class pywfom.viewing.Viewer(run_directory=None)¶

View acquisition files from a specified run directory

Parameters

run_directory (str) -- Path to run directory being viewed

Additional Windows¶

class pywfom.viewing.CameraConfig(camera=None, master=None)¶

tkinter.Toplevel to configure a specified Camera's settings

Parameters

  • camera (pywfom.imaging.Camera) -- Camera whose settings will be edited

  • master (tkinter.Tk) -- Window which opened CameraConfig

class pywfom.viewing.ArduinoConfig(arduino=None, master=None)¶

tkinter.Toplevel to configure the Arduino's settings

Parameters

  • arduino -- Arduino whose settings will be edited

  • master (tkinter.Tk) -- Window which opened ArduinoConfig

class pywfom.viewing.RunConfig(system=None, master=None)¶

Configure the run file

class pywfom.viewing.StimConfig(arduino, index, master)¶

tkinter.Toplevel to configure the an Arduino's stim settings

Parameters

  • arduino (pywfom.control.Arduino) -- Arduino whose stim will be edited

  • index (int) -- Index of the stim

  • master (tkinter.Tk) -- Window which opened StimConfig

class pywfom.viewing.DaqView(arduino, master)¶
